ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 TIMOTHY

block.text: 2 TIMOTHY

ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 TIMOTHY 1
Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ through the will of God, according to the promise of the life which is in Christ Jesus,

block.text: Mi Pol, mi aposel bilong Krais Jisas. Long laik bilong em yet God i makim mi bilong kamap aposel na bilong tokim ol manmeri long dispela laip em i bin promis long givim long ol manmeri i bilip long Krais Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: to Timothy, my beloved child: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord.

block.text: Timoti, yu pikinini tru bilong mi, na mi raitim dispela pas long yu. God Papa wantaim Bikpela bilong yumi Krais Jisas, i ken marimari long yu na sori long yu na mekim yu i stap bel isi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I thank God, whom I serve as my forefathers did, with a pure conscience. How unceasing is my memory of you in my petitions, night and day.

block.text: Ol tumbuna bilong mi i bin mekim wok bilong God long pasin i stretpela tru na i klin long ai bilong God, na mi save mekim wok bilong God long wankain pasin. Na long bel bilong mi, mi pilim olsem mi no gat asua long ai bilong em. Na long taim mi prea long san na long nait, oltaim mi save tingting long yu na mi tenkyu long God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When I remember your tears, I long to see you, that I may be filled with joy;

block.text: Mi ting long wara bilong ai bilong yu i bin pundaun, na mi laikim tumas long lukim yu gen, bai mi ken amamas tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I remember the sincere faith that is in you; which lived first in your grandmother Lois, and your mother Eunice, and, I am persuaded, it is in you also.

block.text: Mi save gut olsem yu bilip tru long Krais, long wankain pasin olsem bipo tumbuna bilong yu Lois na mama bilong yu Yunis i bin bilip. Na taim mi tingting long dispela strongpela bilip bilong yu,

ReferenceBlocks.text: For this cause, I remind you that you should stir up the gift of God which is in you through the laying on of my hands.

block.text: mi laik kirapim tingting bilong yu, bai yu mekim dispela presen God i bin givim yu i kamap strong gen long laip bilong yu, olsem man i winim paia na paia i kamap bikpela. Mi tok long dispela strong God i givim yu olsem presen long taim mi putim han antap long het bilong yu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For God didn’t give us a spirit of fear, but of power, love, and self-control.

block.text: Yu save, dispela Spirit God i bin givim long yumi, em i no spirit bilong mekim yumi i pret. Nogat. Em i Spirit bilong givim strong long yumi na bilong mekim yumi i laikim tru ol arapela na bilong helpim yumi long bosim gut laip bilong yumi yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore don’t be ashamed of the testimony of our Lord, nor of me his prisoner; but endure hardship for the Good News according to the power of God.

block.text: Olsem na yu no ken sem long autim tok bilong Bikpela bilong yumi. Na yu no ken sem long mi, mi kalabusman bilong em. Nogat. Yu mas kisim strong bilong God na karim hevi wantaim mi long wok bilong autim gutnius.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He is the one who saved us and called us with a holy calling, not according to our works, but according to his own purpose and grace, which was given to us in Christ Jesus before times eternal.

block.text: God i bin kisim bek yumi na singautim yumi bai yumi stap manmeri bilong em yet. Em i no ting long gutpela pasin yumi mekim na em i singautim yumi. Nogat. Bipo tru, taim God i no mekim wanpela samting i kamap yet, em i singautim yumi long laik bilong em yet, na long han bilong Krais Jisas em i marimari long yumi na i mekim yumi i kamap manmeri bilong em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It has been revealed to us now by the appearing of our Savior, Christ Jesus. He abolished death, and brought life and immortality to light through the Good News.

block.text: Na nau long dispela taim Krais Jisas, em Man bilong kisim bek yumi, em i kamap ples klia pinis. Na long wok bilong em marimari bilong God tu i kamap ples klia. Krais Jisas i bin pinisim strong bilong i dai, na long gutnius bilong em, em i mekim olgeta manmeri i save long laip i save stap oltaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For this, I was appointed as a preacher, an apostle, and a teacher of the Gentiles.

block.text: Em i laik bai mi mas mekim wok bilong dispela gutnius, olsem na em i makim mi olsem man bilong autim tok bilong God na olsem aposel bilong en na olsem man bilong skulim ol manmeri long ol pasin God i laikim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For this cause I also suffer these things. Yet I am not ashamed, for I know him whom I have believed. I am persuaded that he is able to guard that which I have committed to him against that day.

block.text: Olsem na mi save karim ol dispela hevi. Tasol mi no sem long dispela. Nogat. Mi save pinis long dispela man mi bilip long en. Na mi save gut olsem em inap long lukautim gut dispela wok em i bin putim long han bilong mi, na bai dispela i stap gut oltaim, i go inap long dispela bikpela De bilong Krais i kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Hold the pattern of sound words which you have heard from me, in faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.

block.text: Yu mas tingim gut ol dispela gutpela tok mi bin givim yu na yu mas autim tok long wankain pasin na skulim ol manmeri. Olsem na yu mas bilip strong long Krais Jisas na givim bel bilong yu long em, na long dispela pasin yu mas autim tok long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: That good thing which was committed to you, guard through the Holy Spirit who dwells in us.

block.text: Dispela gutnius God i bin putim long han bilong yu bilong yu lukautim, em i gutpela samting tru, na yu mas was gut long en. Na Holi Spirit i stap insait long yumi, em i ken helpim yu long dispela wok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This you know, that all who are in Asia turned away from me; of whom are Phygelus and Hermogenes.

block.text: Yu save pinis, olgeta man bilong provins Esia i lusim mi pinis, na Figelus na Hermogenes tu i lusim mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: May the Lord grant mercy to the house of Onesiphorus, for he often refreshed me, and was not ashamed of my chain.

block.text: Mi prea long Bikpela i ken sori long Onesiforus wantaim ol famili bilong en. Planti taim Onesiforus i bin mekim gut bel bilong mi. Na em i no sem long mi stap long kalabus. Nogat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when he was in Rome, he sought me diligently, and found me.

block.text: Em i kam long Rom na em i wok strong tru long painim mi, na bihain em i lukim mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the Lord comes again may he show mercy to him. You know what a help he was to me in Ephesus.

block.text: Mi prea long Bikpela i ken sori long em long De bilong bikpela kot bilong God. Na yu save gut olsem Onesiforus i bin mekim planti wok bilong helpim mi long taun Efesus tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 TIMOTHY 2
You therefore, my child, be strengthened in the grace that is in Christ Jesus.

block.text: Orait, pikinini bilong mi, oltaim yu mas larim marimari bilong Krais Jisas i strongim yu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The things which you have heard from me among many witnesses, commit the same to faithful men, who will be able to teach others also.

block.text: Na olgeta tok yu bin harim mi autim long ai bilong planti man, dispela yu mas givim long ol man i save holim strong tok bilong God, na bai ol inap long skulim ol arapela man tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You therefore must endure hardship, as a good soldier of Christ Jesus.

block.text: Yu mas i stap gutpela soldia bilong Krais Jisas na karim hevi bilong dispela wok wantaim mipela ol arapela man i karim hevi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: No soldier on duty entangles himself in the affairs of life, that he may please him who enrolled him as a soldier.

block.text: Yu save long pasin bilong ol soldia. Taim ol i mekim wok soldia, ol i no save holim ol arapela kain wok wantaim. Nogat. Ol i save mekim gutpela wok soldia tasol, bai ofisa bilong ol i ken laikim wok bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Also, if anyone competes in athletics, he isn’t crowned unless he has competed by the rules.

block.text: Na man i ran long resis, em i mas bihainim lo bilong resis. Sapos nogat, em bai i no inap kisim prais bilong man i win.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The farmers who labor must be the first to get a share of the crops.

block.text: Man i mekim bikpela wok bilong planim gaden na lukautim, em i mas kisim hap kaikai bilong dispela gaden paslain long ol arapela man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Consider what I say, and may the Lord give you understanding in all things.

block.text: Yu mas tingting long dispela tok mi mekim, na Bikpela bai i mekim tingting bilong yu i klia, na bai yu save long as bilong dispela olgeta tok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Remember Jesus Christ, risen from the dead, of the seed of David, according to my Good News,

block.text: Oltaim yu mas tingting long Jisas Krais, em i bin i dai na i kirap bek, na em i man bilong lain bilong King Devit, olsem mi save tok long gutnius mi autim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: in which I suffer hardship to the point of chains as a criminal. But God’s word isn’t chained.

block.text: Mi save autim dispela gutnius, na long dispela as tasol ol man i save lukim mi olsem man nogut, na ol i givim ol kain kain hevi long mi na putim mi long kalabus. Tasol tok bilong God em i no inap kalabus i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore I endure all things for the chosen ones’ sake, that they also may obtain the salvation which is in Christ Jesus with eternal glory.

block.text: Olsem na mi save strongim bel bilong mi na karim dispela olgeta hevi, bai mi ken helpim ol manmeri God i bin makim bilong em yet. Mi laik bai ol tu i mas kisim dispela laip i stap long Krais Jisas, na bai ol i stap gut tru wantaim em oltaim oltaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This saying is faithful: “For if we died with him, we will also live with him.

block.text: Yumi ken bilip tru long dispela tok, "Sapos yumi bin i dai tru wantaim em, orait bai yumi stap laip tu wantaim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If we endure, we will also reign with him. If we deny him, he also will deny us.

block.text: Sapos yumi stap strong na karim olgeta hevi, orait bai yumi stap king tu wantaim em. Sapos yumi givim baksait long em, orait bai em tu i givim baksait long yumi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If we are faithless, he remains faithful. He can’t deny himself.”

block.text: Sapos yumi promis long bihainim em, na yumi no bihainim dispela tok bilong yumi, em bai i bihainim yet tok em i bin mekim. Em i no inap senisim tok bilong em yet. Nogat tru."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Remind them of these things, charging them in the sight of the Lord, that they don’t argue about words. It is of no profit, subverting of those who hear.

block.text: Oltaim yu mas helpim ol manmeri long tingim dispela tok. Na long ai bilong God yu mas tok strong long ol i no ken tok pait long ol liklik samting nating, olsem wanem nem yumi mas givim long ol pasin bilong yumi. Dispela kain tok i no inap helpim wanpela man. Nogat. Em i save bagarapim tasol laip bilong ol man i harim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Study to present yourself approved by God, a workman who doesn’t need to be ashamed, properly handling the Word of Truth.

block.text: Yu mas wok strong long kamap wokman tru, na bai God i laikim wok bilong yu. Olsem na bai yu autim stret tok tru bilong God, na bai yu no gat sem long ai bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But shun empty chatter, for it will go further in ungodliness.

block.text: Givim baksait long olkain toktok nabaut i no bihainim tingting bilong God. Dispela kain tok bai i bringim ol man i go moa yet long rot bilong givim baksait long God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Their teaching will consume like gangrene. Hymenaeus and Philetus are like this.

block.text: Dispela kain tok em i olsem sua nogut bilong bagarapim man, na em bai i kamap bikpela tru. Tupela bilong ol man i save mekim dispela kain tok em Himeneus wantaim Filetus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They have turned from the truth, saying that the resurrection is already past, and overthrowing the faith of some.

block.text: Tupela i lusim pinis rot bilong tok tru, long wanem, tupela i save tok olsem, "Yumi kirap bek pinis long matmat, olsem na bihain yumi no inap kirap bek gen." Long dispela tok ol i save bagarapim bilip bilong sampela manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: However God’s firm foundation stands, having this seal, “The Lord knows those who are his,” and, “Let every one who names the name of the Lord depart from unrighteousness.”

block.text: Tasol God i planim pinis strongpela pos bilong wokim sios bilong en, na dispela pos i sanap strong i stap. Na long dispela pos em i raitim tok olsem, "Bikpela i save gut long ol manmeri bilong em yet." Na em i raitim dispela tok tu, "Olgeta man i bin kisim nem bilong Bikpela, ol i mas givim baksait long pasin i no stret."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now in a large house there are not only vessels of gold and of silver, but also of wood and of clay. Some are for honor, and some for dishonor.

block.text: Long wanpela bikpela haus i gat sampela dis samting ol i bin wokim long gol na silva na sampela ol i bin wokim long diwai na sampela ol i bin wokim long graun. Sampela i bilong mekim gutpela wok, na sampela i bilong mekim ol kain kain wok nabaut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If anyone therefore purges himself from these, he will be a vessel for honor, sanctified. A vessel suitable for the master’s use, prepared for every good work.

block.text: Olsem na sapos wanpela man i rausim ol pasin nogut long laip bilong en na em i kamap klin long ai bilong God, orait em bai i stap olsem dis bilong mekim gutpela wok tru. Em bai i stap man bilong God tru, na em bai inap long helpim Bikpela bilong en. Em bai i redi long mekim olgeta kain gutpela wok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Flee from youthful lusts; but pursue righteousness, faith, love, and peace with those who call on the Lord out of a pure heart.

block.text: Olsem na oltaim yu mas givim baksait long olgeta kain laik nogut i save kamap long bel bilong ol yangpela man. Na yu mas wok long kisim stretpela pasin na pasin bilong bilip tru long God na pasin bilong laikim tru ol arapela na pasin bilong bel isi. Na yupela olgeta i mas mekim ol dispela pasin, yu wantaim ol man i stap klin tru long ai bilong God na i save lotu na prea long nem bilong Bikpela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But refuse foolish and ignorant questionings, knowing that they generate strife.

block.text: Na yu no ken putim yau long ol kranki tok nabaut bilong ol man i no gat gutpela tingting. Yu save, dispela kain tok i save kamapim tok pait na tok kros tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Lord’s servant must not quarrel, but be gentle towards all, able to teach, and be patient.

block.text: Na wokman bilong Bikpela i no ken tok pait na tok kros. Nogat. Em i mas mekim gutpela pasin long olgeta man. Sapos ol man i bikhet long em, em i mas daunim belhat na painim ol gutpela rot bilong skulim ol manmeri long ol pasin God i laikim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In gentleness he must correct those who oppose him: perhaps God may give them repentance leading to a full knowledge of the truth.

block.text: Em i mas wok isi na stretim tingting bilong ol man bilong sakim tok. Sapos em i mekim olsem, orait God bai i helpim ol na ating ol bai i tanim bel na kisim gutpela save long tok tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then they may recover themselves out of the devil’s snare, having been taken captive by him to his will.

block.text: Satan i kisim ol pinis long umben bilong en, bilong mekim ol i bihainim tok bilong em. Tasol sapos ol i save long tok tru, orait tingting bilong ol i kamap klia gen, na ol bai i lusim umben bilong Satan na i stap fri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 TIMOTHY 3
But know this, that in the last days, grievous times will come.

block.text: Tasol yu mas save olsem, long taim bilong las de planti hevi nogut tru bai i kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For men will be lovers of self, lovers of money, boastful, arrogant, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, unholy,

block.text: Ol man bai i laikim ol yet tasol, na ol bai i laikim tumas long kisim mani. Ol bai i litimapim nem bilong ol yet na hambak nabaut, na ol bai i tok kros na tok nogut long ol arapela. Ol bai i sakim tok bilong papamama, na ol bai i no tok tenkyu long ol manmeri i mekim gutpela pasin long ol. Ol bai i givim baksait long ol pasin bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: without natural affection, unforgiving, slanderers, without self-control, fierce, no lovers of those that are good,

block.text: Ol bai i no save long pasin bilong i stap pren bilong ol arapela, na taim ol i kros, bai i no gat rot bilong pinisim kros bilong ol. Ol bai i tok nogut long ol arapela. Ol bai i no bosim laik bilong bodi bilong ol, na ol bai i pait na bagarapim ol man nabaut. Ol bai i birua long olgeta gutpela pasin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: traitors, headstrong, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God;

block.text: Ol bai i mekim nogut long ol pren bilong ol yet, na ol bai i bihainim kwik olgeta kranki tingting bilong ol yet. Ol bai i tingim ol yet i bikpela man tru. Ol bai i laikim tumas ol kain kain pasin bilong amamas bilong dispela graun, na ol bai i no laikim God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: holding a form of godliness, but having denied its power. Turn away from these, also.

block.text: Ol bai i bihainim pasin bilong God long skin tasol na ol bai i no save liklik long bikpela strong i stap long pasin tru bilong God. Yu mas stap longwe long ol dispela kain man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For some of these are people who creep into houses, and take captive gullible women loaded down with sins, led away by various lusts.

block.text: Ol dispela kain man i save painim rot bilong i go insait long haus bilong ol meri i no gat gutpela tingting, na ol i grisim ol na bosim tingting bilong ol. Ol dispela meri i bin mekim planti sin, na ol i pilim hevi bilong asua bilong ol. Na bel bilong ol i save kirap na pulim ol long mekim ol kain kain pasin i no gat as bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Such women are always learning, but never able to come to the knowledge of the truth.

block.text: Ol dispela meri i save laikim tumas long kisim skul, tasol ol i no inap kisim save long tok tru bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even as Jannes and Jambres opposed Moses, so do these also oppose the truth; men corrupted in mind, who concerning the faith, are rejected.

block.text: Bipo Janes tupela Jambres i bin birua long Moses, na olsem tasol ol man i mekim dispela pasin ol i save birua long tok tru. Tingting bilong ol i paul olgeta, na ol i no bilip tru long God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But they will proceed no further. For their folly will be evident to all men, as theirs also came to be.

block.text: Tasol dispela pasin bilong ol bai i no kamap bikpela tumas. Nogat. Olgeta man bai i lukim olsem pasin bilong ol i longlong tru, olsem bipo ol man i lukim pasin bilong Janes tupela Jambres i longlong.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But you however know all about my teaching, conduct, purpose, faith, patience, love, steadfastness,

block.text: Tasol yu bin i stap wantaim mi, na yu save pinis long pasin bilong mi long skulim ol manmeri long ol pasin God i laikim. Na yu save long ol pasin mi save wokabaut long en, na long as tru bilong dispela olgeta pasin bilong mi. Yu save olsem, mi save bilip strong long God, na oltaim mi save strongim bel bilong mi na mekim wok, na mi save laikim tru ol arapela na mi stap strong na karim hevi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: persecutions, and sufferings: those things that happened to me at Antioch, Iconium, and Lystra. I endured those persecutions. Out of them all the Lord delivered me.

block.text: Yu save long olgeta pasin nogut ol man i bin mekim long mi na long olgeta pen mi bin karim long Antiok na Aikoniam na Listra. Yu save long ol samting nogut tru ol i bin mekim long mi long ol dispela taun. Tasol Bikpela i bin helpim mi long dispela olgeta hevi na mi stap gut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Yes, and all who desire to live godly in Christ Jesus will suffer persecution.

block.text: Tru tumas, olgeta man i laik pas wantaim Krais Jisas na i bihainim pasin bilong God, ol man bai i mekim nogut long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But evil men and impostors will grow worse and worse, deceiving and being deceived.

block.text: Na ol man nogut na ol giaman profet ol bai i wok long giamanim ol manmeri. Na Satan bai i giamanim ol yet tu, na pasin bilong ol bai i kamap nogut tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But you remain in the things which you have learned and have been assured of, knowing from whom you have learned them.

block.text: Tasol yu, yu mas holim strong dispela tok yu bin kisim na yu save bilip strong long en. Yu save gut long mipela ol manmeri i bin skulim yu long dispela tok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: From infancy, you have known the holy Scriptures which are able to make you wise for salvation through faith, which is in Christ Jesus.

block.text: Na yu save, taim yu bin i stap liklik pikinini yet, yu stat long kisim save long ol buk i gat tok bilong God. Dispela ol buk ol inap long givim gutpela tingting long yu, na bai yu bilip long Krais Jisas, na bai God i kisim bek yu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Every Scripture is God-breathed and profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for instruction in righteousness.

block.text: Spirit bilong God yet i bin kamapim olgeta tok i stap long buk bilong God. Na dispela tok em i gutpela samting tru bilong skulim yumi long tok tru na bilong stretim ol manmeri tingting bilong ol i no stret na bilong stretim wokabaut bilong yumi na bilong skulim yumi long ol pasin i stret long ai bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It gives the man of God everything he needs so that he will be complete, thoroughly equipped for every good work.

block.text: Olsem na dispela tok i mekim yumi ol manmeri bilong God i kisim tru olgeta gutpela pasin, na em i mekim yumi i redi long mekim olgeta kain gutpela wok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 TIMOTHY 4
I command you therefore before God and the Lord Jesus Christ, who will judge the living and the dead at his appearing and his Kingdom:

block.text: Long ai bilong God na bilong Krais Jisas, em bai i skelim pasin bilong olgeta manmeri i stap laip na ol manmeri i dai pinis tu, mi tok strong long yu olsem, Krais Jisas bai i kamap long ai bilong olgeta manmeri na em bai i stap king oltaim oltaim,

ReferenceBlocks.text: Preach the word; be urgent in season and out of season; reprove, rebuke, and exhort, with all patience and teaching.

block.text: olsem na yu mas strong long autim tok bilong em. Maski sapos ol man i redi long harim tok o ol i no redi, oltaim yu mas wok strong long autim tok bilong Krais. Yu mas givim strongpela tok long ol bilong sutim bel bilong ol na bilong kirapim ol long tanim bel na bihainim pasin bilong God. Na oltaim yu mas isi long ol na skulim ol gut long ol pasin God i laikim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the time will come when they will not listen to the sound doctrine. Having itching ears, will heap up for themselves teachers after their own lusts.

block.text: Harim. Bihain ol man bai i no laik harim moa ol stretpela tok. Nogat. Yau bilong ol bai i skrap long harim ol narakain narakain tok, na ol bai i kisim planti man bilong skulim ol long kain tok ol i save laik long harim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They will turn away their ears from the truth, and turn aside to fables.

block.text: Olsem na ol bai i givim baksait long tok tru na putim yau long ol kain kain stori nating.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But you be sober in all things, suffer hardship, do the work of an evangelist, and fulfill your ministry.

block.text: Tasol yu yet yu mas tingting klia oltaim. Yu mas karim ol hevi na pen. Yu mas mekim wok bilong autim gutnius long ol manmeri. Yu gat wok bilong helpim ol manmeri, na yu mas mekim tru dispela wok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I am already being offered, and the time of my departure has come.

block.text: Yu save, klostu nau bai mi dai na blut bilong mi bai i kapsait olsem dispela wain ol i save givim long God olsem ofa. Taim bilong mi long i go em i klostu pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have fought the good fight. I have finished the course. I have kept the faith.

block.text: Mi bin ran strong long gutpela resis bilong laip. Nau mi kamap pinis long mak, na mi bin holimpas bilip bilong mi long God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: From now on, there is stored up for me the crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, will give to me on that day; and not to me only, but also to all those who have loved his appearing.

block.text: Nau prais bilong man i winim resis em i redi na i wetim mi i stap. Dispela prais em i olsem. Bikpela bai i kolim mi stretpela man. Bikpela i save bihainim pasin i stret tasol na skelim pasin bilong ol manmeri, na long De bilong bikpela kot bilong em, em bai i givim dispela prais long mi. Na em bai i no givim long mi wanpela tasol. Nogat. Em bai i givim long olgeta man i laikim tumas long lukim em na i wetim em i kamap ples klia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Be diligent to come to me soon,

block.text: Yu mas trai hat long kam long mi kwiktaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: for Demas left me, having loved this present world, and went to Thessalonica; Crescens to Galatia, and Titus to Dalmatia.

block.text: Harim. Demas em i lusim mi pinis. Em i laikim tumas ol pasin bilong dispela graun, na em i go long taun Tesalonaika. Kresens i go long provins Galesia, na Taitus i go long distrik Dalmesia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Only Luke is with me. Take Mark, and bring him with you, for he is useful to me for service.

block.text: Luk wanpela tasol i stap wantaim mi. Olsem na yu mas kisim Mak na bringim em i kam wantaim yu. Em i gutpela man bilong helpim mi long wok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I sent Tychicus to Ephesus.

block.text: Tikikus mi salim i go pinis long Efesus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Bring the cloak that I left at Troas with Carpus when you come, and the books, especially the parchments.

block.text: Taim yu laik i kam, orait yu mas kisim dispela longpela saket mi bin lusim i stap long taun Troas, long haus bilong Karpus. Na kisim ol buk tu. Na lukaut tru bai yu no lusim tingting long ol dispela buk ol i bin wokim long skin bilong abus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Alexander, the coppersmith, did much evil to me. The Lord will repay him according to his works.

block.text: Aleksander, em man bilong wokim ol samting long bras, em i bin mekim nogut tru long mi. Bihain Bikpela bai i mekim save long em, bilong bekim dispela pasin em i bin mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You also must beware of him; for he greatly opposed our words.

block.text: Yu tu yu mas lukaut long dispela man. Em i bin birua tru long tok bilong mipela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: At my first defense, no one came to help me, but all left me. May it not be held against them.

block.text: Namba wan taim mi bekim tok bilong kot i no gat wanpela man i sanap wantaim mi na helpim tok bilong mi. Nogat. Olgeta man i lusim mi. Mi prea long God i no ken tingting long dispela rong bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the Lord stood by me, and strengthened me, that through me the message might be fully proclaimed, and that all the Gentiles might hear; and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion.

block.text: Tasol Bikpela yet i bin sambai long mi na givim strong long mi. Olsem na mi autim gutnius inap tru, na olgeta lain haiden i harim. Na God i bin kisim bek mi long maus bilong laion.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And the Lord will deliver me from every evil work, and will preserve me for his heavenly Kingdom; to whom be the glory forever and ever. Amen.

block.text: Olsem tasol Bikpela bai i kisim bek mi long olgeta pasin nogut ol i laik mekim long mi, na em bai i mekim mi i stap gut na bringim mi i go long kingdom bilong en i stap long heven. Yumi mas litimapim nem bilong em oltaim oltaim. I tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Greet Prisca and Aquila, and the house of Onesiphorus.

block.text: Yu mas givim gude bilong mi long Prisila wantaim Akwila, na long ol famili bilong Onesiforus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Erastus remained at Corinth, but I left Trophimus at Miletus sick.

block.text: Erastus i stap yet long taun Korin. Na Trofimus i gat sik na mi lusim em i stap long taun Miletus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Be diligent to come before winter. Eubulus salutes you, as do Pudens, Linus, Claudia, and all the brothers.

block.text: Yu mas trai hat long kam kwik. Nogut yu wet, na taim bilong kol na strongpela win i kamap. i salim gude long yu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Grace be with you. Amen.

block.text: Bikpela i ken i stap wantaim spirit bilong yu. Na marimari bilong en i ken i stap wantaim yupela olgeta.
